snippet: Former Gov. Mark Sanford must appear in court two days after running in a special election in May to answer a complaint that he trespassed at the home of his ex-wife, Jenny Sanford.
abstract: Former South Carolina Gov Mark Sanford must appear in court to answer complaint that he trespassed at home of ex-wife Jenny Sanford; complaint comes as Sanford is running for Congress, trying to revive his political career.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Mark Sanford must appear in court two days after running in a special election in May to answer a complaint that he trespassed at the home of his ex-wife, Jenny Sanford.

headline.main: South Carolina: Sanford Is Accused of Trespassing
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Sanford Is Accused of Trespassing
